div.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, Feb. 12, 1925Adv. SWEDES ON THE NORTH SIDE!See Varmlanningarna The Greatest Swedish Film Featuring Anna Q. Nilsson in the role of "Anna"

body.p: See this popular melodrama of Swedish folk lore, peasant pageantry and old Swedish customs -- See the children in gay national costumes dancing around the May-Pole.
Don't fail to see this film at Julian Theatre
Next week on Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday
